messages.subject: Commercial Message - Tsuba for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings to all, I have just added two nice tsuba to my web site. The first is a large (9.6cm) Saotome kiku sukashi tsuba and the other charming Choshu
messages.messageBody:
Greetings to all,

I have just added two nice tsuba to my web site. The first is a large (9.6cm)
Saotome kiku sukashi tsuba and the other charming Choshu example. Please have a
look if you are interested.

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html


Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
